name: Seoi Man!
description:
Sprites drawn over the pictures available on Judo Channel. The game is taking a while to finish load (about 2 or 3 minutes), so I added an windows executable as an alternative. That said, have fun and... HAJIME!

Made in 3 days for Low Effort Jam 9.

Controls:

Arrows left and right: move

Spacebar: attack (when close to opponent)
